title: Wall Street Halts GameStop Rally | Regina King & Doug Henwood
itunes:title: Wall Street Halts GameStop Rally | Regina King & Doug Henwood
description:
Doug Henwood weighs in on the GameStop stock surge, Roy Wood Jr. talks to African political scholars about America's democratic crisis, and Regina King discusses "One Night in Miami."


Please visit dailyshow.com/FirstRespondersFirst to help provide medical and psychological treatment for first responders on the front lines of fighting COVID
